title: Cant lgoin to client but can login on website
body: So I just opened the client and typed in my username and password but it says invalid username/password. After that I went onto this website logged in and I got in perfectly without any error? Anybody know how this is happening and how I can fix it?

replies.body: woops I'm stupid, It was set to oceania. Thanks

Are you logged into the correct region?  If so and still having an error, go over the [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to help recover your account.  Hope that helps get you back in!
